Headline: #73 Armitage Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Armitage/Lavergne
ShortDescription: Eastbound 73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound  #73 Armitage buses are temporarily rerouted via Armitage, Grand, Cicero and Armitage due to street blockage near Armitage/Lavergne.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
